```{r}
bike_data <- db%>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT *
FROM trips t
LEFT JOIN station_months s
ON t.start_station_id = s.station_id
WHERE stop_time LIKE '%2017-11-22 %'
AND birth_year = 2000
AND bike_id = 17321;
")
```
